CustomField.description: Update the selected related/sibling/parent/child agreement status category/status values along with the primary agreement i.e. the agreement being sent for eSignature. This setting is used only when the "Select Attachments From Related/Sibling" setting is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Update the selected related/sibling/parent/child agreement status category/status values along with primary agreement i.e. the agreement being sent for eSignature. This setting is used when the "Select Attachments From Related/Sibling" setting is checked.
CustomField.label: Update RSPC Agreement Status
